long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
--
Introducing our innovative Chrome extension designed for front-end developers using Ant Design! This tool empowers you to make real-time theme adjustments on your local websites, enhancing your development workflow and allowing for instant visual feedback. Say goodbye to tedious refreshes and hello to seamless design iterations as you experiment with various themes effortlessly. Transform your development experience today!
--
介绍我们的创新Chrome扩展，专为使用Ant Design的前端开发者设计！这个工具让您可以实时调整本地网站的主题，提升您的开发工作流程，并实现即时的视觉反馈。告别繁琐的刷新，轻松无缝地进行设计迭代，尽情尝试各种主题。今天就来改变您的开发体验吧！
